original_title: Sri Lanka are champions at Wheelchair Tennis Asia Oceania Qualification Event
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – Sri Lanka won the championship at the BNP Paribas World Team Cup Asia Oceania Qualification Event of the Uniqlo Wheelchair Tennis Tour in Thailand, beating hosts Thailand 2-1 in the finals.

Earlier, Sri Lanka topped Group 2 beating China 2-1, Australia 3-0 and Pakistan 3-0, while Thailand won Group 1 where they competed against South Korea and India. Sri Lanka got impressive performances from Suresh Dharmasena, Gamini Dissanayake and Pradeep Kumara at the tournament held from Feb. 28-March 3.
